amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to enter into an agreement providing for the joint use of Dobbins Air Reserve Base, Marietta, Georgia, with civil aviation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 943 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 943 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5793) To authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to enter into an agreement providing for the joint use of Dobbins Air Reserve Base, Marietta, Georgia, with civil aviation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 943 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 943 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 1003.
